forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 6C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High around 45F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Periods of light rain early. Low 4C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low 42F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 47F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 4C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 41F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending early. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. High 42F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming cloudy with snow likely after midnight. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 90%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming cloudy with snow likely after midnight. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 90%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will become lighter during the afternoon. High 2C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 27F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 23F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow showers developing during the afternoon. High -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning followed by periods of snow showers later in the day. High 31F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low near -5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low near 25F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. High around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Temps nearly steady in the low to mid 30s. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -1C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 7-12cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. Low 31F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 2C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 38F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mixture of rain and snow showers. Low near 0C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. Low 34F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. High 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning changing to rain showers in the afternoon. High around 40F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mixture of rain and snow showers. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mixture of rain and snow showers. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 40F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
